description: This CSS file contains styling for a React application, with defined variables for light and dark themes, component styling, and responsive design elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container that centers content with a background color based on the defined CSS variables.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component of the app, styled to display flexibly and centered with a specific background and text color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link component styled for visibility and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button component for toggling between themes with styling for position, background, colors, and hover effects.
